channel.title: Need help again
channel.description:
Well I got my main back wewt!!!!
Its kinda newby. SO I need your advice Mopar.
Here is my skills: [img]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/9711/091123194415.png[/img]
My money: [img]http://img214.imageshack.us/img214/6208/091123194557.png[/img]
Advice please ^v^

item.title: Need help again
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Im thinking def at yaks.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help again
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:11, topic:315851”]Well Im going to do what Lothy said. Teaks maybe to like 80 and skip the willows. Then do Ivy to 90. Do yews to 99. And yes. Im thinking of getting cb in this order.

  1. 70 Range
  2. 70 str and att.
  3. 70 def.
  4. 60 mage
  5. 52 pray.
  6. 60 Summoning (Optional)[/quote]
    Do the melee first, using flesh crawlers in the stronghold of security.
    Once you have flat 70s in melee, do the same for range. Choose between an msb and bronze arrows, or bronze knives and either a shield or prayer book.
    If you collect the natures, green charms, noted iron ore, ranarr and fire runes instead of afking then you stand to make reasonable money.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help again
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:9, topic:315851”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=412304.msg3041326#msg3041326 date=1259133474]

Do willows when your ~90.

No, do teaks. Teaks are the fastest experience in the game (paired with proper use of mouse keys to drop your logs).

Regarding combat: AFK at flesh crawlers for some easy levels. When you get flat 70s you could do the spirit of summer quest, get jemica’s ring, and train in the axe hut in the alternate realm for easy AFK experience (mind you, you need to ‘reset’ them to aggressive every 10 minutes).
This is the best way to max imo, as you can just watch movie after movie while only really interacting with the game in a large way every 10 minutes.
[/quote]Wrong. Teaks aren’t as fast as Ivy (although you get nothing from ivy’s).[/quote]
They are faster. Zarfot did a video on youtube etc. Teaks still come out on top.

Read full topic

Do willows when your ~90.
[/quote]
No, do teaks. Teaks are the fastest experience in the game (paired with proper use of mouse keys to drop your logs).

Regarding combat: AFK at flesh crawlers for some easy levels. When you get flat 70s you could do the spirit of summer quest, get jemica’s ring, and train in the axe hut in the alternate realm for easy AFK experience (mind you, you need to ‘reset’ them to aggressive every 10 minutes).
This is the best way to max imo, as you can just watch movie after movie while only really interacting with the game in a large way every 10 minutes.[/quote]Wrong. Teaks aren’t as fast as Ivy (although you get nothing from ivy’s).

@lothy wrote:

cumescape:

Do willows when your ~90.

No, do teaks. Teaks are the fastest experience in the game (paired with proper use of mouse keys to drop your logs).

Regarding combat: AFK at flesh crawlers for some easy levels. When you get flat 70s you could do the spirit of summer quest, get jemica’s ring, and train in the axe hut in the alternate realm for easy AFK experience (mind you, you need to ‘reset’ them to aggressive every 10 minutes).
This is the best way to max imo, as you can just watch movie after movie while only really interacting with the game in a large way every 10 minutes.
